content: Based on the URL provided, can you provide me with a SQL query that can identify whether https://www.exampleblogstore.com/ is a blog or an e-commerce store based on the data stored in our database? The database contains a table called "websites" with columns "url" and "type" where type can be either "blog" or "e-commerce".

Certainly! To determine whether "https://www.exampleblogstore.com/" is a blog or an e-commerce store based on the data stored in your database, you can use the following SQL query:

```sql
SELECT type
FROM websites
WHERE url = 'https://www.exampleblogstore.com/';
```

This query will retrieve the type of website (either "blog" or "e-commerce") for the given URL from the "websites" table. Make sure that the URL in the query matches exactly with the one stored in your database for accurate results.
